page.title: 18OUTDOOR PURSUIT CENTRES
page.content: There are two centres that cater for outdoor pursuits. One is{Broadstone {Warren}and the other is{Hindleap {Warren.}Broadstone Warren is run by the Scout Movement and their camp consists of several permanent buildings nestled in amongst the foliage of the Ashdown Forest.Hindleap Warren is run by the Boys Club of Great Britain and is a large and well appointed centre.Residential courses are run for schools and youth groups and many activities are on offer including map reading,orienteering rock climbing, canoeing and swimming. There is a staff of permanent wardens who see to the efficient running of the establishment and their courses are always well supported especially in the summer months.A good Christian influence is clearly evident.
